message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Let's make a deal, Alice. I'll take a bit more, you take a bit less. We both win in the end.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 55/45.  This way we both get a decent share.
Alice, time is running out!  This is my final offer. Let's get this done so we both walk away with something.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a little concerned about the dwindling time.  Let's meet in the middle and split it 40/60.  It's still more than I'd get if we run out of rounds.
